57730.<voice 00475_00057730><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00475_00057730><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>Oh, <pc>. Thank you so much for your help

57731.<voice 00580_00057731><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00580_00057731><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>I never would've expected the Hero Zankrone to

57732.<voice 00695_00057732><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00695_00057732><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>But he's nothing like the gentleman of my grandfather's

57733.<voice 00795_00057733><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00795_00057733><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>You called me?<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57735.<voice 01080_00057735><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01080_00057735><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>Oh, Zankrone, you've been secretly eating my bread

57736.<voice 01170_00057736><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 01170_00057736><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>I didn't scarf nothing. It was a taste test, just a taste test.<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57737.<voice 01330_00057737><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01330_00057737><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>Sure... If only you were as gentlemanly as the Zankrone

57739.<voice 01700_00057739><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 01700_00057739><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>...This village is peaceful, right.<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

<voice 01780_00057740><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>Hey, <pc>. Seems like I've come to a different

57742.<voice 02000_00057742><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02000_00057742><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>I gotta make this kind of scene for the people in the

57744.<voice 02150_00057744><start_lip_sync n0:

57745.<voice 02280_00057745><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02280_00057745><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>I'll find 'em, catch 'em, and force it out of 'em! Say...

57746.<voice 02450_00057746><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 02450_00057746><start_lip_sync n02212 _normal m00001>Rabbits like... Carrots, don't they?<stop_lip_animation n02212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

<voice 02755_00057749><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>Gather some jam and butter, and then meet me inside
